bibl.title: Two Papyri from Jeme.
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: P. Harris Inv. 92 = P. Gascou 61. An assessment for xenion. Jeme, early 8th c. - Inv. 88 b+c = P. Gascou 62. Letter from Menas to Chael, illustrios and archon. Jeme, early 8th c. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.13 P. Harris Inv. 88 b+c = P. Gascou 62; 92 = P. Gascou 61
Gesa Schenke, Two Papyri from Jeme.
Jean-Luc Fournet & Arietta Papaconstantinou (edd.), Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P. Gascou) = TravMém 20 (2016) 1, pp. 403-411, 3 figg.; - 661.

P. Harris Inv. 92 = P. Gascou 61. An assessment for xenion. Jeme, early 8th c. - Inv. 88 b+c = P. Gascou 62. Letter from Menas to Chael, illustrios and archon. Jeme, early 8th c. - Avec résumé en anglais.
